about_the_game:
This DLC contains the "TGS special cloak skin" for Farsiders' protagonist Cassie. The cosmetic was created specially for those who attended and participated the event at our booth during Thailand Game Show 2022. For those eligible, you can use the key sent to you via email to redeem this special cloak skin.
You can change Cassie's cloak at the start menu before starting the game.

Once again, thank you for supporting Farsiders!
